Your password unlocks your Recovery key

Your data is only readable through a chain of decryption operations that begins with your master encryption key, which we store encrypted with your password. This means that if you lose your password, your Recovery key can no longer be decrypted, and you can no longer decrypt your data.
Exporting the Recovery key and keeping it in a secure location enables you to set a new password without data loss.
An external attacker cannot gain access to your account with just your key. A password reset requires both the key and access to your email.
Copy the Recovery key to the clipboard or save it as text file.
The Recovery key has been successfully copied

The system ensures that the data received is truly from the specified sender, and its content has not been manipulated during transit.

Enhance the MEGA Chat experience. URL content will be retrieved without end-to-end encryption.
Two-factor authentication is a second layer of security for your account.
Why do you need two-factor authentication?

Two-factor authentication is a second layer of security for your account. Which means that even if someone knows your password they cannot access it, without also having access to the 6-digit code only you have access to.
Scan or copy the seed to your Authenticator App.
Be sure to back up this seed to a safe place in case you lose your device.
Please enter the 6-digit code generated by your Authenticator App.
An error occurred generating the seed or QR code, please try again.
Next time you log in to your account you will be asked to enter a 6-digit code provided by your Authenticator App.
Please save your Recovery key in a safe location, to avoid issues in case you lose access to your app, or if you want to disable two-factor authentication.

You need an authenticator app to enable 2FA on MEGA. You can download and install the Google Authenticator, Duo Mobile, Authy or Microsoft Authenticator app for your phone or tablet.

resources.string: Do you remember your password?\nMEGA cannot reset your password if you forget it.
MEGA needs write permissions to your device storage to continue.
Options such as “Send decryption key separately”, “Set expiry date” or “Set password protection” are only available for single items.
Please assign one or more new hosts.
You are invited to a meeting.
Tap the Meeting link sent to you or paste it here
MEGA needs access to your microphone and camera for meetings.
Go to Settings to allow MEGA to access your camera and microphone.
Invite more participants to the meeting. Swipe up to invite.
Tap to create a new meeting
Quickly set up a MEGA meeting with our new encrypted meeting feature
Please enter a valid meeting link
Join the largest secure cloud storage and collaboration platform in the world.
Sign up now and enjoy advanced collaboration features for free.
Another call in progress. Please end your current call before making another.
Logging out deletes your offline content.
Hide recent activity in Home section.
Change settings to choose which screen opens when you next launch the MEGA app.
MEGA does not support image insertion here

Our file versioning feature ensures that we keep older copies of your files around if you replace them with newer versions. If you disable File Versioning you will no longer have this protection; the old copy will be lost when you replace it.
Invite sent successfully. See sent requests.
Please enter a valid file or folder link
Please enter a valid chat link
You have pasted a chat link.
You have pasted a contact link.
Use mobile data to preview high resolution images
Allow the use of mobile data to load high resolution images when previewing. If disabled, the original image will only be loaded when you zoom in.
You are deleting your backups folder. This will remove all the backups you have set. Are you sure you want to do this?
Please type “%1s” to confirm this action
To ensure these items added to your backup folder are automatically synchronised to the MEGA Cloud, please set them up in the MEGA Desktop App.
This folder can only be shared as read-only; as this is a backup folder, any changes to its content could disable the backup.

Items in this folder are part of a configured backup and are synchronised to a local folder. Taking this action will break the synchronisation and disable the backup. The backup can be re-enabled in the MEGA Desktop App. Are you sure you want to proceed?
These folders can only be shared as read-only; as they are backup folders, any changes to their content could disable the backups.
Some folders shared are backup folders and read-only. Do you wish to continue?
You already have a subscription. If you buy another one you will be charged twice. To avoid this, cancel your current subscription through %1$s. Visit our Help Centre for more information.

You already have a subscription. If you buy another one you will be charged twice. To avoid this, cancel your current subscription from your iTunes account. Visit our Help Centre for more information.

You already have a subscription. If you buy another one, you will be charged twice. To avoid this, cancel your current subscription by going to MEGA in a desktop or mobile web browser. Visit our Help Centre for more information.
Go to Settings to grant MEGA permission to access your nearby devices using Bluetooth.
We are unable to proceed with the billing. If you are using a dual app, please consider logging in to MEGA without it. If not, try to upgrade through your web browser.
You have an active MEGA subscription with %1$s. You must cancel it separately at %2$s, as MEGA is not able to cancel it for you. Visit our Help Centre for more information.
You have an active MEGA subscription. It will be canceled automatically after the account is deleted. Visit our Help Centre for more information.
You have an active MEGA subscription with Apple. You must cancel it separately from your iTunes account, as MEGA is not able to cancel it for you. Visit our Help Centre for more information.
This is the last step to delete your account. Both your account and subscription will be deleted and you will permanently lose all the data stored in the cloud. Please enter your password below.
File format is not supported. Cannot open the file.
The selected folder is empty. No files to upload.
You have entered your current password
File removed as it violated our Terms of Service.
This device doesn’t have an app to select folders.
Open unsupported file types in third-party apps
Unsupported files types will be opened in third-party apps instead of the MEGA app.
Send optimised images when on mobile data but original size images when on Wi-Fi.
Transfers have been paused. Resume them to proceed with the download.
Please do not close the application.
Transfers not yet processed will be cancelled.
A file named [B]%1$s[/B] already exists at this destination.
Select the file you want to keep
Select whether you want to merge the folders
The current version of the file will be replaced with the file you are uploading.
The file will be updated with version history:
The file you are uploading will be renamed as:
Replace the file in the destination folder with the file you are moving.
The file you are moving will be renamed as:
Replace the file in the destination folder with the file you are copying.
The file you are copying will be renamed as:
Apply this option on the next %1$d conflicts
Merge the folder at the destination with the folder you are copying.
Merge the folder at the destination with the folder you are moving.
Merge the folder at the destination with the folder you are uploading.
No files will be changed. You will keep the file below:
A folder named [B]%1$s[/B] already exists at this destination.
Call will automatically end in 2 mins unless you want to stay on it.
Your feedback helps us improve MEGA. Please clearly describe the issue you’ve experienced. The more details you provide, the easier it will be for us to resolve it.
No internet connection. Check your connection and try again.
Something went wrong. Please try again later. If you still can’t submit the issue, contact %s for assistance.
We have received your report. We’ll look into the issue and get back to you.
This file type isn’t supported. To open the file, download it first.
This will end the call for all participants.
You’re the only host on the call. Do you want to assign another one before leaving?
[A]%1$s[/A][B] was changed to standard role by [/B][A]%2$s[/A]
[A]%1$s[/A][B] was changed to host role by [/B][A]%2$s[/A]
%1$s was changed to standard role by %2$s
%1$s was changed to host role by %2$s
Talk securely and privately on audio or video calls with friends and colleagues around the world.
Chat securely and privately, with anyone and on any device, knowing that no one can read your chats, not even MEGA.
Hear a sound when someone joins or leaves a call.
File not saved to Cloud drive. Try again.
MEGA will send you call, chat, and file transfer notifications.

This is where your backed up files and folders are stored. Your backed up items are “read-only” to protect them from being accidentally modified in your Cloud drive.\nYou can back up items from your computer to MEGA using our desktop app.
Account suspended due to copyright violations. We sent you an email with more information about this.
Account terminated due to a breach of MEGA’s Terms of Service, such as abuse of others’ rights, sharing and importing illegal data, or system abuse.
Thank you for your Pro Lite monthly subscription
Thank you for your Pro Lite yearly subscription
Thank you for your Pro I monthly subscription
Thank you for your Pro I yearly subscription
Thank you for your Pro II monthly subscription
Thank you for your Pro II yearly subscription
Thank you for your Pro III monthly subscription
Thank you for your Pro III yearly subscription
You have no contacts to add to this chat. If you want to add participants, first invite them to your contact list.
You’ve already added all your contacts to this chat. If you want to add more participants, first invite them to your contact list.
Saved image to your device gallery
This album name is not allowed. Enter a different name.
An album with this name already exists. Enter a different name.
Your payment for the %1$s plan was received.
Your payment for the %1$s plan was unsuccessful.
